subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: While Harvard captured its first-ever N.C.A.A. tournament victory, over New Mexico, top-seeded Gonzaga barely scraped by with a six-point win over No. 16 Southern University.
snippet: While Harvard captured its first-ever N.C.A.A. tournament victory, over New Mexico, top-seeded Gonzaga barely scraped by with a six-point win over No. 16 Southern University.
